Platform: PS3

Code disc : BLES00538
Firmware: 3.55 / image for Cobra ODE
Multiplayer: (2 ) Local / Internet



Description:
Fight Night Round 4 - is not only pass in the harsh world of uncompromising boxing, but also a unique opportunity to experience the hard way especially the style of different boxers. In the role of a young Mike Tyson , deftly swaying from side to side, causing devastating hooks and uppercuts , you'll be able to press aggressively rivals. And in the role of Muhammad Ali did not leave the enemy and the chance thanks to the extraordinary agility and speed blows. And for the first time in history you will have the opportunity to pit two legendary heavyweights in a memorable duel ! " The Greatest " Muhammad Ali vs. "Iron " Mike Tyson - who wins ?
A new episode of the famous series of Fight Night raises the bar of realism at an incredible height. Dramatic battles now are played strictly by the laws of physics. At every blow and push boxers react exactly like real people. They can miss and instead direct glancing blows may fall during the fight - fight unfolding on the screen, does not differ from a television broadcast . Unless you're in it - not a spectator , but a participant !
